Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface HalApiReturnTypeSupport

  • @ConsumerType
public interface HalApiReturnTypeSupport
    An SPI interface that allows to use additional return types (e.g. RxJava 1 observables, or Spring Reactor Flux or Mono) in your HAL API interfaces

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      boolean isProviderOfMultiplerValues​(Class<?> returnType)  
      default boolean isProviderOfOptionalValue​(Class<?> returnType)  

    • Method Detail

      • convertFromObservable

        <T> Function<io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable,​T> convertFromObservable​(Class<T> targetType)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to covert to
        Parameters:
        targetType - the type to convert to
        Returns:
        a function that will create an instance of the given type from an Observable, or null if this is not possible

      • convertToObservable

        Function<Object,​io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable<Object>> convertToObservable​(Class<?> sourceType)
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the type to convert from
        Returns:
        a function that will create an Observable from an instance of the given type, or null if this is not possible

      • isProviderOfMultiplerValues

        boolean isProviderOfMultiplerValues​(Class<?> returnType)
        Parameters:
        returnType - the return type of an annotated method
        Returns:
        true if the type is a collection or a reactive type that can emit multiple values

      • isProviderOfOptionalValue

        default boolean isProviderOfOptionalValue​(Class<?> returnType)
        Parameters:
        returnType - the return type of an annotated method
        Returns:
        true if the type is an Optional or a reactive type that can emit zero or one values
